verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, ye children <WH1121>, the instruction <WH4148> of a father <WH1>, and attend <WH7181> <WH8685> to know <WH3045> <WH8800> understanding <WH998>.
For I give <WH5414> <WH8804> you good <WH2896> doctrine <WH3948>, forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> ye not my Torah <WH8451>.
For I was my father's <WH1> son <WH1121>, tender <WH7390> and only <WH3173> beloved in the sight <WH6440> of my mother <WH517>.

He taught <WH3384> <WH8686> me also, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Let thine heart <WH3820> retain <WH8551> <WH8799> my words <WH1697>: keep <WH8104> <WH8798> my Mitzvot <WH4687>, and live <WH2421> <WH8798>.
Get <WH7069> <WH8798> wisdom <WH2451>, get <WH7069> <WH8798> understanding <WH998>: forget <WH7911> <WH8799> it not; neither decline <WH5186> <WH8799> from the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310>.
Forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> her not, and she shall preserve <WH8104> <WH8799> thee: love <WH157> <WH8798> her, and she shall keep <WH5341> <WH8799> thee.
Wisdom <WH2451> is the principal thing <WH7225>; therefore get <WH7069> <WH8798> wisdom <WH2451>: and with all thy getting <WH7075> get understanding <WH998>.
Exalt <WH5549> <WH8769> her, and she shall promote <WH7311> <WH8787> thee: she shall bring thee to honour <WH3513> <WH8762>, when thou dost embrace <WH2263> <WH8762> her.
She shall give <WH5414> <WH8799> to thine head <WH7218> an ornament <WH3880> of grace <WH2580>: a crown <WH5850> of glory <WH8597> shall she deliver <WH4042> <WH8762> to thee.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, O my son <WH1121>, and receive <WH3947> <WH8798> my sayings <WH561>; and the years <WH8141> of thy life <WH2416> shall be many <WH7235> <WH8799>.
I have taught <WH3384> <WH8689> thee in the way <WH1870> of wisdom <WH2451>; I have led <WH1869> <WH8689> thee in right <WH3476> paths <WH4570>.
When thou goest <WH3212> <WH8800>, thy steps <WH6806> shall not be straitened <WH3334> <WH8799>; and when thou runnest <WH7323> <WH8799>, thou shalt not stumble <WH3782> <WH8735>.
Take fast hold <WH2388> <WH8685> of instruction <WH4148>; let her not go <WH7503> <WH8686>: keep <WH5341> <WH8798> her; for she is thy life <WH2416>.
Enter <WH935> <WH8799> not into the path <WH734> of the wicked <WH7563>, and go <WH833> <WH8762> not in the way <WH1870> of evil <WH7451> men.
Avoid <WH6544> <WH8798> it, pass <WH5674> <WH8799> not by it, turn <WH7847> <WH8798> from it, and pass away <WH5674> <WH8798>.

For they sleep <WH3462> <WH8799> not, except they have done mischief <WH7489> <WH8686>; and their sleep <WH8142> is taken away <WH1497> <WH8738>, unless they cause some to fall <WH3782> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH3782> <WH8799>.
For they eat <WH3898> <WH8804> the bread <WH3899> of wickedness <WH7562>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> the wine <WH3196> of violence <WH2555>.
But the path <WH734> of the just <WH6662> is as the shining <WH5051> light <WH216>, that shineth <WH215> <WH8804> more <WH1980> <WH8802> and more unto the perfect <WH3559> <WH8737> day <WH3117>.
The way <WH1870> of the wicked <WH7563> is as darkness <WH653>: they know <WH3045> <WH8804> not at what they stumble <WH3782> <WH8735>.
My son <WH1121>, attend <WH7181> <WH8685> to my words <WH1697>; incline <WH5186> <WH8685> thine ear <WH241> unto my sayings <WH561>.
Let them not depart <WH3868> <WH8686> from thine eyes <WH5869>; keep <WH8104> <WH8798> them in the midst <WH8432> of thine heart <WH3824>.
For they are life <WH2416> unto those that find <WH4672> <WH8802> them, and health <WH4832> to all their flesh <WH1320>.
Keep <WH5341> <WH8798> thy heart <WH3820> with all diligence <WH4929>; for out of it are the issues <WH8444> of life <WH2416>.
Put away <WH5493> <WH8685> from thee a froward <WH6143> mouth <WH6310>, and perverse <WH3891> lips <WH8193> put far <WH7368> <WH8685> from thee.
Let thine eyes <WH5869> look <WH5027> <WH8686> right on <WH5227>, and let thine eyelids <WH6079> look straight <WH3474> <WH8686> before thee.
Ponder <WH6424> <WH8761> the path <WH4570> of thy feet <WH7272>, and let all thy ways <WH1870> be established <WH3559> <WH8735>.
Turn <WH5186> <WH8799> not to the right hand <WH3225> nor to the left <WH8040>: remove <WH5493> <WH8685> thy foot <WH7272> from evil <WH7451>.
